Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Remind \Re*mind"\ (r?-m?nd"), v. t. To put (one) in mind of something; to bring to the remembrance of; to bring to the notice or consideration of (a person). [1913 Webster]
When age itself, which will not be defied, shall begin to arrest, seize, and remind us of our mortality. --South. [1913 Webster]

remind v 1: put in the mind of someone; "Remind me to call Mother" 2: assist (somebody acting or reciting) by suggesting the next words of something forgotten or imperfectly learned [syn: {prompt}, {cue}]
